backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two ZIP-download-related features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/landing/componen: Component explaining the three-step Anchor Protocol with two example corrections and anchor statements.
Displays a static Pattern Interrupt image illustrating the WEAK-END to FAMILY-TIME swap.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with a ZIP source-code download link and site copyright/attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: About section presenting a portrait, title, subtitle, and descriptive text about the linguistic reprogramming system.
Hero section with background imagery, headline, descriptive text, and primary/secondary CTA buttons linking to PayPal.
Mission section outlining global wellness initiatives with icons and a donation-related message.
Renders a multi-part product overview with seven sections describing concepts and tools in the 25-Word PDF Checklist. Includes icons, descriptions, and styled layout blocks.
Displays a themed section revealing how language affects biology, with examples of harmful phrases and explanatory callouts. Includes styled cards, icons, and background imagery.
Wraps VideoSectionBase to render the second video using a predefined source and query parameter override.
Provides multiple educational sections covering linguistic concepts like Try vs Execute and the Week-End myth, using graphics, callouts, and styled content blocks.
Wraps VideoSectionBase to render the primary video with default configuration and optional URL override.
Handles video rendering with preflight availability checks, error states, and fallback UI. Supports query param overrides and detailed error messaging.
Displays two downloadable printable tools (Monitor Strip and 25-Word Checklist) with descriptions and download buttons. Includes styled cards and a tip section.
Presents a 7‑day reset program with benefits list and a CTA button linking to PayPal. Includes decorative background elements and centered content.
frontend/src/config/landing.ts: Defines URLs, CTA labels, video sources, and download paths used throughout landing page components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and loads stored identities using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocationSearch.ts: Tracks URL search parameters reactively by listening to navigation and history events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color tokens, themes, and utility classes for the app’s design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the landing page layout from multiple content sections and a footer with a charcoal background.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, shadows, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, issues, and new feature requests for build planning.
